name: ROBOTROOPER: SIMULATION
description:
Story

You exist within a simulated reality, created for the purpose of testing the newest Robotrooper prototype and related gun technology before they are manufactured in the real world. You are put in the role of this simulated Robotrooper and tasked with getting through the test chambers of the simulation.

Will your model make it into production? Will some adjustments have to be made beforehand? Or will you prove a complete failure, dooming your kind to never be produced at all?

Where Credit Is Due Audio

  • BASS - C - Sick Neuro Shred by Black Octopus Sound (Free Sample)

  • PM SFM UTILITY MISC 17 by PMSFX (EULA)
  • Modular UI - Calculations and Text-011 from #GDCAudioBundle2015 (GDC Bundle License)
  • Whoosh,Sound Design,Power Down from #GDCAudioBundle 2018 (GDC Bundle License)
  • BR Glitched Loop 43 from #GDCAudioBundle 2018 (GDC Bundle License)
Font
  • Elektora by Apostrophic Labs (Free for commercial use)
Support

If you experience any bugs or glitches during gameplay, please submit a bug report at: https://www.thedigitaltechnologist.com/support.
